method.name: POST
method.doc: To install a new license, issue a POST request containing the license to the license installation endpoint.

request.doc:
The license must be sent as form data. The field name for the license must be 'license'.
POST /licenses HTTP/1.1 Content-Type: multipart/form-data Accept: application/json
For example, to install a license using curl:
curl https://10.0.8.23/licenses -u admin:password --form license=@ICN_IBMSEC_ACCESSMGR_EXAMPLE.123456789.1.isslicense -H "Accept: application/json"

param.name: message
param.doc: A status message indicating the action performed.

response.doc: Invalid license or parsing error. Inspect the response body to determine the result.

param.name: error
param.doc: An error message indicating why the license installation failed.
